thread.section_title: MacCredit Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of MacCredit | www.maccredit.com.au
thread.title: Maori Girl Oz
thread.title_full: MacCredit reviewed by Maori Girl Oz

author: Maori Girl Oz
title: Maori Girl Oz
text:
I was very sceptical at first due to online application. (Especially with all the online scams out there) However MacCredit customer service had contacted me within 24 hrs. I found the loan process was simple and easy to follow. I cannot fault the customer service personnel as they were very helpful efficient and friendly. My loan was processed and approved within days and the money was in my account. Customer Service personnel were in contact with me through the whole process via email or phone contact to ensure I was satisfied and or happy with information received. Fantastic service.
Never got this much help from other credit providers so thank you MacCredit .
